name: Clomipramine

dosing.notes: Take at bedtime to minimize sedation. Titrate slowly to reduce side effects.

canadian_clinical.titration_schedule: Increase by 25 mg every 3-5 days as tolerated.
canadian_clinical.inpatient_strategy: Start 25 mg nocte. Titrate to 100-150 mg over 1-2 weeks. Target 150-250 mg for OCD.
canadian_clinical.outpatient_strategy: Start 25 mg nocte x 1 week, then 50 mg. Review in 4 weeks. Target therapeutic dose over 4-6 weeks.

cautions.renal: Use with caution; limited data. Start low.
cautions.hepatic: Avoid in severe hepatic impairment. Reduce dose in mild-moderate impairment.
cautions.pregnancy: Avoid if possible; neonatal withdrawal reported. Use only if benefit outweighs risk.
